summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of real property located on Martin Luther King, Jr. Way South in Block 5, Kaufman's Addition to the City of Seattle; declaring the property to be surplus to the City's needs; authorizing the sale of the property to an abutting property owner; authorizing the Director of the Fleets and Facilities Department to execute a Quitclaim Deed in connection therewith; and designating the disposition of sales proceeds.
